acceptance-test-run.title: Invoking Podam on a POJO with a private, no arguments constructor, should return a non null POJO
acceptance-test-run.name: invokingPodamOnaPojoWithPrivateNoArgumentsConstructorShouldReturnANonEmptyPojo

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.PrivateNoArgConstructorPojo
Then the Object uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.PrivateNoArgConstructorPojo@1613d1c should not be null
Then the int field should not be zero
